page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: This area has a history of industrial development. Evidence of paper mills has been found along the River Darent. The first paper mill in the country is reputed to have been in Dartford. Extensive archaeological discoveries have been made on the site of the Gunpowder Mills. The site has been saved from demolishing and building over by the developers of the nearby industrial estate. This estate, Dartford Trade Park, has a variety of manufacturing industries as well as warehousing and distribution facilities. Industries include:- Dyecast tools Furniture Cables Marine services Bottles All occasion cards Plate engraving Sherry bottling Home appliances Paper merchants Bus shelters Piano parts Chrome work Gumming machines Computer printers
